page.title: 06Chair Caning
page.content: My name is Penny Trayler. I live at Frostenden in Suffolk. My Dad works as achair caner. He does rush chairs, cane chairs and sea-grass chairs. My mum helps him and so does Sue Elvin. About every three weeks he goes and drops some chairs off and sometimes he collects them. Occasionally he does chairs for antique dealers. He has done a chair for Princess Ann and for Lulu. He is self-employed. He started at the age of 16 and taught himself. Sometimes there are no broken chairs and work is scarce. Our Grandad was a milkman so Dad thought he was going to be a milkman but I'm glad he wasn't. I don't know where he gets his reeds and rushes from but a big lorry delivers them. Penny Trayler.
